abstract: A Web video by a TV actor in support of Herman Cain brings a taste of the spaghetti western to the campaign.
snippet: A Web video by a TV actor in support of Herman Cain brings a taste of the spaghetti western to the campaign.
lead_paragraph: The viral video featuring Herman Cain's chief of staff taking a long drag from a cigarette has prompted the discovery of another YouTube video sitting latent since August.

headline.main: Discovering a Cain Campaign Sleeper Hit
